import React from 'react' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function Details({h, currentFormattedData}) { const [weatherDetails, setWeatherDetails] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { if (currentFormattedData) { console.log(currentFormattedData); const lat = currentFormattedData.lat; const lon = currentFormattedData.lon; console.log(lat,lon); const currentDate = new Date().toISOString(); console.lpg try { const brightSkyResponse = await fetch(`https://api.brightsky.dev/weather?lat=${lat}&lon=${lon}&date=${currentDate}`); const brightSkyData = await brightSkyResponse.json(); setWeatherDetails({ temperature: brightSkyData?.temperature, icon: brightSkyData?.icon, time: new Date(brightSkyData?.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }), });console.log(weatherDetails); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching Bright Sky data:', error.message); } } }; fetchData(); }, [currentFormattedData]); return (
